Name: Fiendish Thieves
About the game: An all new Interactive Feature Film / FMV game The best way to describe Fiendish Thieves is Home Alone meets Frankenstein a fun Interactive movie suitable for all audiences. Filled with lots of laughs and slapstick humour. You choose the actions of the bungling burglars who search an abandoned warehouse for a rare vintage pocket watch and the obsessed film fan munching on snacks watching the events unfold. Starring Julian Seager (Death Race 4, Fisherman's Friends, Guardians of the Galaxy) Shawn C Phillips (Youtube Star Coolduder) Boyd Rogers (Doc Martin) Matt Stuart Scarlet Brooke (Alternative Model) Jamie Smith (She’s Dead) Featuring • Stylized FMV video • Multiple paths • Multiple endings • Hidden scenes
